name: Outside Temperature
Inside Temperature
Dew Point Outdoor
Humidity Outdoor
Constants
initialize:
var deviceName = "sencorsws12500"
var device = {
    name: deviceName,
    ids: "73722946-9bd0-4fc0-a0c1-ecf6a8036248",
    mf: "Sencor",
    mdl: "SWS12500",
    sw: "1.0"
}
flow.set("deviceName", deviceName)
flow.set("device", device)
flow.set("id", "e4ab4c")
flow.set("outside_temp_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/outside_temp`)
flow.set("inside_temp_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/inside_temp`)
flow.set("dew_point_outdoor_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/dew_point_outdoor`)
flow.set("humidity_outdoor_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/humidity_outdoor`)
flow.set("humidity_indoor_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/humidity_indoor`)
flow.set("wind_speed_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/wind_speed`)
flow.set("wind_gust_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/wind_gust`)
flow.set("wind_direction_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/wind_direction`)
flow.set("rain_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/rain`)
flow.set("rain_daily_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/rain_daily`)
flow.set("baro_pressure_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/baro_pressure`)
flow.set("uv_index_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/uv_index`)
flow.set("solar_radiation_topic", `homeassistant/sensor/${deviceName}/solar_radiation`)
